constructor.details: Constructor initializes with Chainlink price feed or mock price

params._goldPriceFeed: Address of Chainlink gold price feed (0x0 for mock mode)

convertPoiToUsd(uint256).details: Convert POI tokens to USD amount based on current gold price

convertUsdToPoi(uint256).details: Convert USD amount to POI tokens based on current gold price

getGoldPricePerGram().details: Get current gold price per gram in USD

returns._0: price Current gold price with 8 decimals

getGoldPriceWithTimestamp().details: Get gold price per gram with timestamp

returns._0: secondsElapsed Seconds since last price update

isPriceStale().details: Check if price is stale (older than threshold)

returns._0: isStale True if price is stale

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.stopped: True to stop, false to resume

params.useMock: True to use mock price, false for real oracle

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateGoldPrice(uint256).details: Update gold price (for testing or manual updates)

params.newPrice: New gold price per gram in USD (8 decimals)

params.mockPrice: New mock price per gram in USD (8 decimals)

updatePriceFromChainlink().details: Update price from Chainlink feed (public function)
